katia_and_michele_are: Katia and Michele are a couple you'll struggle to find only one word to describe!
complementary_since_2007: Complementary since 2007, like red and green, yellow and purple, blue and orange.
hes_a_scientist: He's a scientist and a dreamer, she's creative and pragmatic. Sometimes they switch, sometimes they find themselves in the same world.
theres_something_we_share: There's something we share and brought us together: music, wonders and the beauty of experiencing. These threads of existence guided us toward unveiling our true selves, and embarking on the pursuit of our most authentic dreams.
moving_across_four_different_countries: Moving across five different countries and living the culture we were in, brought us to lower the walls and accept the fact that we are who we are and others too!
inevitably_during_our_country_hop: Inevitably, during our country-hop we met people who became friends, places that feel like home, that for a reason or another is becoming hard to meet again or go again. So, we had to face the "nostalgia". Life happens, and we can't stand the nostalgia feeling to drive our lifestyle.
life_happens_and_it_is_on_you: Life happens and it is on you living it. Embrace the best and the worst. In both cases it will leave you with the taste of an experience. Spoiler alert: both taste of happiness. This to say that some experiences will unlock answers, some others raise questions and others will build a better you!
this_epic_venture_started_as_ten_peaks: This epic venture started as Ten Peaks and became X Peaks. Why restricting experience into a number? Ten became X.
x_equal_to_ten_and_countless: X equal to ten and countless! Peak is a challenge. The challenge of maintaining a promise friends make while life happens everywhere you are to see each other aging (soon!).
x_peaks_is_a_place_where_adventures: X Peaks, is a place where adventures, friends and nature meet. Collect memories that taste of a place you experienced.
technical_issue: Got a technical issue? Want to create your custom package? Or just want to say hi? We're here to help you. Fill out the form to reach out!
subject: Subject
surrounded_by_adventures: Be surrounded by the collection of your adventures.
collect_memories: Collect memories that taste of a place you experienced.
each_package_description: Each package is centered around adventures, friends and nature. Adventures to have memories not dreams, with friends you choose for a reason, in the nature with countless edges.
personalize_experience: We are open to personalising your experience and answering any of your questions. Looking forward to hearing from you!
as_the_best: as the most suitable time of the year for this adventure
contact_description: We are open to personalising your experience and answering any of your questions. Looking forward to hearing from you!
name: Name
faq_description: Check the frequently asked questions to find immediate answers to the most common questions
book_your_spot: Book your spot by paying a deposit
deposit: 30% deposit due now, the remainder will be charged 6 weeks prior to the start. Free cancellation until then.

thank_you_for_your_purchase: Thank you so much for your purchase, you'll hear from us soon :)

get_detailed_information_about_your_drea: Get detailed information about your dream destination.
